data.title: MEDICAL MASSAGE PRACTITIONER LISTING
data.meta_description: Are you looking for a referral to a massage therapist with extraordinary skills?  We have put together this listing of massage therapists who have graduated from our Medical Massage program. Find your next amazing massage therapist here!
data.text:
Looking for a referral to a massage therapist with extraordinary skills?

You have come to the right place!

Over the years, we have trained tens of thousands of therapists across the United States to be the best in the business. Medical Massage Practitioners have the skills to treat chronic conditions, are capable of accepting physician referrals, do billing insurance and provide some of the best massage therapy treatments available.

Whether you are a physician looking for a great LMT to refer patients to, a massage clinic looking to hire highly qualified therapists, a spa director looking for great therapists that will keep your clients coming back, or a massage client searching for a therapist who can provide an advanced level of treatment, we have the therapist for you!

By request, we have recently started compiling this list of massage therapists who have graduated from our Medical Massage Practitioner program. You can rest assured that these therapists have excellent post-graduate level training to be able to help you!

Are you an MMP who is qualified to be on this list?

We respect the privacy of our students and only include students on this list who have the credentials to be there and who specifically request to be included. Only written or email requests will be accepted. It is the responsibility of the practitioner to ensure that this information is kept up to date. This listing is relatively new. If you graduated from our program prior to the list inception, you are still eligible. If you have graduated from our Medical Massage Practitioner Program and would like to receive a free listing on our website, please click here.
